content.text: I'm a chef that loves to travel and share my food with others. My favorite type of food is seafood.
I like to travel too. I always bring my backpack and a tent when I go.
Do you have a favorite place to go?
I like going to national parks. I just got back from Yosemite.
I've never been to Yosemite. What's it like?
It's beautiful! There's a lot to see and do.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I like the hiking and camping.
I love to hike too. Have you ever been to the Grand Canyon?
No, I haven't. I've heard it's amazing.
It is! I went there a few years ago and it was breathtaking.
Maybe I'll go there next time I go on vacation.
You should! It's definitely worth it.
